formattedAddress: 41 E 11th St, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 41 E 11th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text:
I treated my team to a retreat at the Clementine Creekhouse, and after working together online for so long through screens, it was the most inviting and intimate setting for us all to unwind, bond, and gather.

The house is spacious and comfortable, with plenty of room to play games, cook, and entertain. The beds were hands down the most comfortable beds I've ever slept on, and we travel frequently. The property grounds were also gorgeous, and there is a lovely creek that runs through the property underneath a historic bridge. The screened in porch was an idyllic spot to enjoy the beautiful views and sip on morning coffee.

The nearby town of Callicoon is small but quaint and charming. We had no idea it was an antique store treasure trove, so we enjoyed strolling around and popping into the shops and perusing all of the eclectic antiques. We did a tasting at the distillery which was fun and delicious.

Red Cottage had great communication to ensure our stay went smoothly.

Everything was lovely, and I can't wait to book our next retreat with Red Cottage!

originalText.text:
A large group of us stayed at river side cabin and cottage in equinunk and had a wonderful experience. Plenty of space and perfect location to relax and unplug for the weekend. With a large deck with an outside stereo system to the river scenic view and a firepit to gather round at night while we all got to catch up. The rec room was perfect for some activities while listening to a great selection of vinyl a personal favorite of mine on site.
The host was great with communication and even checked in on a cold night to make sure all was well. Highly recommend and will for sure be keeping this location in mind for our future annual trips! Thanks for a great getaway!

originalText.text: We stayed at 3 Whitetail Lane in Magretville. The house was beautiful, clean and located 13 minutes from Belleayre.  Great stay!

text.text: We stayed at 3 Whitetail Lane in Magretville. The house was beautiful, clean and located 13 minutes from Belleayre.  Great stay!

originalText.text: The house was great, perfectly clean, well equipped, spacious and cozy.  We used the pool and the hot tub, and our dogs lived the massive grassy yard.  The weather was a bit average but we had plenty of space inside to play games and have a nice meal.  Highly recommend!

text.text: The house was great, perfectly clean, well equipped, spacious and cozy.  We used the pool and the hot tub, and our dogs lived the massive grassy yard.  The weather was a bit average but we had plenty of space inside to play games and have a nice meal.  Highly recommend!

originalText.text: My family of six adults vacationed for four nights at Red Cottages 'Highball House' in February 2023. Great home! A bit closer to the road than we originally expected, but it didn't matter. The area is very quiet and there is plenty of yard space/greenery around. Great distance to local errands/attractions (without being too close) for those who are looking to lay some what low for your stay. We loved the fireplace, large windows, most of all- the layout of the main floor. Every detail was considered, including a towel warmer in the master, very well-stocked pantry, robes/slippers, and any electronics charger and cord you may have forgotten. Bathrooms were updated and had some extra touches that elevated the experience. There were multiple ways to hook up your phone to play music, floor pillows for extra seating, and most lights were on dimmers- which was a nice feature, especially at night. The basement was cold and the heaters (provided) were necessary. Overall, a stylish, well-thought-out, clean rental that we will definitely book again!
